explains: adj. 坚韧不拔的；有砂砾的；多沙的；像砂的

sentences.en: MGM tended to put out a lot of all-star productions while Paramount excelled in comedy and Warner Bros, developed a reputation for gritty social realism.
sentences.cn: MGM 倾向于推出大量全明星的作品，而派拉蒙擅长喜剧，华纳兄弟则建立了坚韧不拔的社会现实主义的名声。

sentences.en: We have to prove how gritty we are.
sentences.cn: 我们必须证明我们有多坚毅。

sentences.en: Time ran out before we could get down to the real nitty-gritty.
sentences.cn: 我们还没来得及探讨真正的细节，时间就过去了。
